title: Seattle City Council Sustainability & Renters' Rights Committee 4/27/21
description:
View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy

In-person attendance is currently prohibited per Washington State Governor's Proclamation 20-28.15, until the COVID-19 State of Emergency is terminated or Proclamation 20-28 is rescinded by the Governor or State legislature. Meeting participation is limited to access by telephone conference line and online by the Seattle Channel.

Agenda: Call to Order, Approval of the Agenda; Public Comment; Community panel discussion on Council Bill 120046, relating to preventing school year evictions of children, their families, and educators; Community panel discussion on Council Bill 120056, relating to closing the fixed-term lease loophole in Seattle's Just Cause Eviction Ordinance (JCEO); Community panel discussion the Green New Deal in Seattle and the fight for green infrastructure and against fossil fuel companies.

Advance to a specific part
Public Comment - 15:00
Community panel discussion on Council Bill 120046 - 49:40
Community panel discussion on Council Bill 120056 - 1:30:42
Community panel discussion the Green New Deal in Seattle - 2:11:50
